meanings.sent2: She sawed through the thick branch.
meanings.sent3: The beaver sawed away at the tree, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her words sawed through his heart like a sharp blade.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the sawed wood echoed through the forest.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he sawed the log into pieces.
meanings.sent2: She sawed the metal pipe last week.
meanings.sent3: The magician sawed the box in half and amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: His words sawed through her excuses, revealing the truth.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the sawed tree brought back childhood adventures.
